DOC.brief_summary: The aim double blind , randomize , placebo-controlled clinical trial investigate immediate effect spinal manipulation hip knee muscle strength pain-free deep squat range motion order answer several conceptual practical research question
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , double-blind , randomize control trial clinical use multigroup pretest-posttest control design 1 treatment arm 1 control arm . Interpreted within biopsychosocial model International Classification Functioning , Disability Health ( ICF ) framework , research measure outcomes patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) , health condition , contextual factor , particularly personal factor . It address personal factor gender age address environmental factor . This research include test measure two three level human functioning , domain , impairment body function structure activity limitation . Muscle strength test impairment-level measure pain-free deep squat range morion ( ROM ) activity limitation-level measure .
DOC.criteria: Referred outpatient physical therapy knee condition chief complaint anterior knee pain Anterior knee pain squat Agreed study sign informed consent document Presence medical 'red flag ' suggestive pain musculoskeletal origin Osteoporosis recent fracture hip spinal joint Spinal hip joint surgery prosthesis Knee surgery affect knee within last 6 month Spinal instability ( Grade II spondylolithesis great ) , spondyloarthritides , severe spinal misalignment Nervous system disease disorder Pregnant Lumbar nerve root compression ( follow sign present ) Positive straight leg raise ( SLR ) test le 45Â° Marked paresis involve major muscle group lower extremity Diminished , asymmetric ( low uninvolved side ) , low extremity muscle stretch reflex Diminished absent sensation pinprick low extremity dermatome
